attributes.action: Challenge Royal Mail on Strikes by CWU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want Royal Mail to be honest and up front to CWU and not lie and be corrupt about their figures for 2007? ACAS report should be interesting?
What did RM do with the money Government gave them for modernising the buisness?
If no money in the pot why did managers have big bonuses this year and from where did this come from?
A decent wage for a decent days work is all we ask for, we are not getting this on the frontline!
Get Leighton & Crozier to sit and negotiate or the Country will loose its postal service to privatisation

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
